sys_script_include.name: GPTUtilClient

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_d3b1069697c03110d70ef207f053af1a
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_424426_devops.GPTUtilClient</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>GPTUtilClient</name><script><![CDATA[/* global global, sn_fd, Class, gs */
/* eslint no-undef: "error" */
var GPTUtilClient = Class.create();
GPTUtilClient.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	initialize: function(request, responseXML, gc) {
		global.AbstractAjaxProcessor.prototype.initialize.apply(this, arguments);
	},
	
	prompt: function () {
		const result = {
			status: 'error',
			message: ''
		};
		
		
		let messages = this.getParameter('messages');
		if (messages) {			
			try {
				messages = JSON.parse(messages);
				
				const outputs = sn_fd.FlowAPI.getRunner()
					.action('x_424426_devops.prompt_gpt')
					.inForeground()
					.withInputs({ 
						'messages': messages
					})
					.run()
					.getOutputs();

				result.response = outputs.response;
				result.status = 'success';
			} catch (e) {
				result.status = 'error';
				result.message = e.toString();

				if (gs.hasRole('admin') && e.stack) {
					result.message += '\nStack: ' + e.stack;
				}
			}
		} else {
			result.message = gs.getMessage('devops_invalid_parameters');
		}
		
		return JSON.stringify(result);
	},

    type: 'GPTUtilClient'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-17 19:10:14</sys_created_on><sys_id>d3b1069697c03110d70ef207f053af1a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GPTUtilClient</sys_name><sys_package display_value="DevOps+" source="x_424426_devops">0b41a31b97cf2110d70ef207f053afb0</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="DevOps+">0b41a31b97cf2110d70ef207f053afb0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_d3b1069697c03110d70ef207f053af1a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-21 17:43:36</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
